Posts.Content: I am glad that I found this site. I'm on my fourth injection. Weight gain and a general lack of sexual interest are my two major concerns. my urologist has a general so what attitude which is discouraging at best. I'm 71 and don't want to give up my physical life with my wife of less than two years. She has been great in supporting me with no complaints at all. Even though we have gone from two or three times a week to zip. I Am not sure how much longer I can endure these injections. I don't know if I am the norm or an outlier.
Posts.Title: Thoughts on my Hormone Treatment
